formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'GetGroupCount' =-
[Synopsis] Get the channel count of a group
[Description] Usage: GetGroupCount([groupname][@category]) Calculates the group count for the specified group, or uses the current channel's group if not specifed (and non-empty). Stores result in GROUPCOUNT. Note: This application has been deprecated, please use the function GROUP_COUNT.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
